name: One Ronin
description:
one ronin is a side scrolling  game full of action in which we will have to face ordes of enemies with different abilities and strengths

-1 playable level

-3 types of enemies

-1 final boss

the game is still in development. The paid version will include:

-5 more chapters

-5 more stages

-5 bosses with different abilities

-more enemies

-history mode

-auto save

-and more

fedback is welcome to improve the game
